text: Veronica is a 1972 Romanian musical movie directed by Elisabeta Bostan and starring Lulu Mihaescu, Margareta Pîslaru, Dem Radulescu. It was followed up by Veronica se întoarce in 1973. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 fantasy movies Category:1970s musical movies Category:Romanian movies Category:Movies directed by Elisabeta Bostan
title: Veronica (1972 movie)
